alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 12 at 1:05PM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West or northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Barstow Area, the Morongo Basin, and Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines causing power outages. Travel could be difficult due to hazardous crosswinds on some roadways including Interstate 15. Blowing dust may reduce visibility in some areas.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert
